TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAccessibleHandler

Docs.summary: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler>, see the documentation for the `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AccessibleObjectFromID (int hwnd, int lObjectID, out Accessibility.IAccessible pIAccessible);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AccessibleObjectFromID(int32 hwnd, int32 lObjectID, class Accessibility.IAccessible pIAccessible) runtime managed

Docs.param: Specifies the handle of a window for which an IAccessible interface pointer is to be retrieved.
Specifies the address of a pointer variable that receives the address of the object's IAccessible interface.
Docs.summary: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler.AccessibleObjectFromID%2A>, see the documentation for the `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
